metadata.synopsis: Reactivity on the doublet mannequin as Shadowheart manages to remember a little bit about it after passing a memory check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Interact with the mannequins

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: This disguise... I remember it. We all had to wear it, for training. Horrible, itchy thing.
0.context: NodeContext: Stirred memory upon looking at a tunic on a mannequin.
